00043   Charge(double const charge, double const radius, double const x, double const y, double const z)
00044     {
00045       set_charge(charge);
00046       set_radius(radius);

00048 
00049       unset_movable();
00050     }
00051 
00052   Charge(double const charge, double const radius, double const x, double const y)
00053     {
00054       Charge(charge, radius, x, y, 0);
00055     }
